# 𓐍 𓍔 heat

𓍔 ≈ ND/NG/GN in

𓏏 𓍔 𓄿 𓉐 | kiln | तन्दूर tandūr تندور tandūr tender tandoor 𒈊 dinigʳ₃ 𒁲𒉌𒅅 ti-ni-ʒar •dinʒar तन्दूर tandūr تندور tandūr تندور tandūr tender tandoor

𓃀 𓍔 𓏏 𓅱 𓆙 | avoiding | √bend √vacuus <> forbūgan “to bend away from” 𓃀 𓍔 𓏏 𓅱 𓆙 | avoid | پرهیزیدن parhizidan 피하다 pihada ⇔ hide

𓍔 ⋍ heiz

𓌦 𓏏 𓐍 𓏴 𓀜 | weave | сотка́ть sotkátʹ
𓋴 𓏏 𓍔 𓄿 | weave | сотка́ть sotkátʹ (𓍔 ⋍ 𓏘 𓏏 q.t)

𓏏 𓍔 thermi

U30 𓍔 Ty(ch),ti(sh),tch, thei Thr ⇨ thermi,turm,temper,tomb TrMp 𓍔⇔𓍒 𓍖 𓍘𓏤 𓍘𓏤𓏤 𓍘𓇋𓇋 𓍘𓏮

𓍔 ⋍ 𓏘𓏏 q.t ⇔ caldea (heat/Kälte)

Adjectives via suffix -tive -𓍘𓏤 -𓏏𓏮 -𓏏𓍔 prime => primitive
Adjectives via suffix -ty -𓍘𓏤 -𓏏𓏮 -𓏏𓍔 -다 high => haughty < -tig
Adjectives via suffix -y -𓇋𓇋 -𓏮 fun => funny

[Adjectives] -ment ⇔ min:
𓏏 𓍔 𓈙 𓏴 | boundary | terminus !!

𓋴 𓏏 𓍔 𓏏 𓊮 | censer, lamp | Ständer √Stämmig

µ 𓈙 𓏏 𓍔 | mysterious | !
𓈙 𓏏 𓍔 𓄿 𓅱 𓏛 𓏥 | (religious) mysteries | Satire!! σατυρικόν δράμα
